DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate short long term clinical performance safety commercially available U2 Knee™ System .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Post Approval Clinical Follow-Up Study Commercially Available U2 Knee™ System - `` U-Propel Study ''
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single arm , multi-center , post-approval study design evaluate short long term clinical performance safety subject receive primary total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) U2 Knee™ System . The study enroll 200 subject schedule pre-discharge , 6-week , 3- 6-month 5-year annual follow-up visit . Study outcomes analyze publish 1 . ) enrol implanted subject complete 6-week follow , 2 . ) implant subject complete 2-year follow , 3 . ) conclusion study . The study follow GCP guideline register clinicaltrials.gov .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject 18 75 year age 2 . Subject indicated unilateral total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) base approve labeling device 3 . Subject history previous prosthetic replacement device orthopedic surgery operative knee 4 . Subject willing able provide inform consent participate study ; 5 . Subject willing able understand purpose study , his/her role , available return clinic/hospital require followup visit ; Subjects exclude , opinion Investigator , subject qualify base approve labeling requirement Subject Inclusion criterion .
